channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WI

item.title: Report X-2024030043
item.description:
Report X-2024030043

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-11T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-27
  • City: OAK CREEK
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS NOTIFIED BY A SUPERVISOR ON THE BULK BELT, THAT THERE WAS AN LEAKING STEEL PAIL ON A BULK CART. RESPONDER RESPONDED IN PROPER PPE ALONG WITH DECISOIN TREE AFTER READING FOLLOWING STEPS OF DECISION TREE, LEAKAGE WAS CLEANED UP WITH ABSORBENT AND PAIL WAS BROUGHT TO SERVICE CENTER FOR FUTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024030101
item.description:
Report X-2024030101

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-08T18:13:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-23
  • City: OAK CREEK
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A LEAKING DANGEROUS GOODS PACKAGE THAT WAS MARKED AND LABELED AS CONSUMER COMMODITY ID8000 WITH A CLASS 9 DIAMOND LABEL, AIR LIMITED QUANTITY MARKING, AND SHIPPERS DECLARATION. THE DANGEROUS GOODS PACKAGE HAD PREVIOUSLY PASSED AN ACCEPTANCE AUDIT AT THE ORIGIN FACILITY IN THE NETHERLANDS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED ONE PRODUCT LEAKING DUE TO THE CLOSURE BEING PRESSED DOWN BY OTHER PRODUCTS WITHIN THE PACKAGE. SOME ABSORBENT LINING WAS INSIDE THE PACKAGE WHICH HELPED CONTROL THE EXTENT OF LEAK OUTSIDE OF THE PACKAGE. THE PACKAGE AND CONTENTS HAVE BEEN PROCESSED THROUGH THE NORMAL DISPOSAL PROCEDURES. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM THE NETHERLANDS GOING TO THE USA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER B567JO, ARVATO BENELUX BV, BREM 1, HEIJEN NETHERLANDS 6598MH.
